title: Like any other temple
review: It was a temple like any other with a crowd gathering in and going from one point to the next and out again.

title: shiva temple
review: Good prachin temple. Maintanence is good. I didnt see any priest there when I went but that may be an exception. It will be good however if there is one all the time

title: Temple of Lord Shiva.
review: Mahadeva Temple is dedicated to Lord Shiva and is well known temple in and around Pushkar Region. The temple has statue of Lord shiva having five faces (Panchmukhi Shiva) made of entire white marble.This temple of 19th Century is also known for numerous sculptures and carving. A Nice visit.

title: Shiva temple
review: This is a very nice temple dedicated for Lord Shiva, especially the five headed Lord Shiva statue is very famous.

title: Memorable experience
review: It was a brief but a memorable visit for me. I still remember the amazing architecture of the temple.

title: holy experience
review: This temple is famous for five- faced idol of Lord Shiva. It was one of its kind. Its sheer magnificence will make you feel good. The temple management was also nice as it was cleaner than other temples in the town.

title: Not Bayon
review: On the way leading to the Brahma temple, only shorter a bit, you have to turn right. Mahadeva mandir is famous for its five-faced Shiva and using of white marble for facing. But the temple itself is not too old, though visited by pilgrims.

title: Soul touching evening Arati
review: We reached this temple late in the evening as the last point of our Pushkar visit. It just happened evening Arati just started and we had the chance to sing along the bhajans and worship Lord Mahadev. It has given a satisfactory completion to the day and felt good and happy.

title: Har Har Mahadev
review: This temple is dedicated for "Lord Shiva". The five headed Lord Shiva's statue is very famous. Nice views and surrounding environment is good enough.

title: Panchmukhi shiva
review: This Shiva temple is located near to Bramha temple a worth a visit. Not like other lingam temple, this has panchmukhi (five faced) Shiva statue...

title: Shiv temple
review: This was very famous temple in this area. Good architecture and nice campus of temple. Many people came in evening time .

title: Shiva with five faces
review: This temple is dedicated to Lord Shiva who is called Mahadeva. Lord Shiva with His magnificent five faces graces us in this temple. The five faces are named Sadyojat, Vamdev, Aghor, Tatpurush and Ishan.  The four faces of Shiva represent the four directions. The fifth face which points skywards is the universal face symbolic of purity and spiritual progress. Also five faces represent five elements Prithvi, Varun, Vayu, Agni and Akash. Anything in the Universe is made of these five elements in different proportions. The temple is built with white marbles and is a peaceful abode of Shiva. It is just 3 minutes walk away from Lord Brahma temple. After visiting Lord Brahma temple, we visited Varaha temple (Lord Vishnu) and visited three temples of Shiva, last one Lord Mahadeve temple and completed our pilgrimage with the grace of Trimurthy / Trinity.
